UpdateRoot.testTitle: Generation of RVSM Non-Approval alerts (flight level range validation)
UpdateRoot.testObjective:
This test checks that SKYRADAR generates RVSM Non-Approval alerts when track flight level is within RVSM airspace range.
Conditions for RVSM Non-Approval alert generation are:
1) The RVSM monitoring system status is equal to OPERATIONAL.
2) The track flight level is within RVSM airspace range (between RVSM_MIN_FL=290 and RVSM_MAX_FL=410).
3) The track RVSM approval status indicator is set to NOT_APPROVED or UNKNOWN.
4) The track altitude source quality indicator is equal to HIGH or MEDIUM.
5) The track is located within an RVSM designated airspace zone where monitoring is active.
6) The track flight plan indicates IFR operation.
7) The flag RVSM_EMERGENCY_EXCEPTION is set to false or the track squawk code is NOT emergency (7500/7600/7700).
- 1st step: track FL is BELOW RVSM range (FL280 < FL290), no RVSM alert should be generated.
- 2nd step: track FL is WITHIN RVSM range (FL350 between FL290-FL410), RVSM alert should be generated.
- 3rd step: track FL is ABOVE RVSM range (FL420 > FL410), no RVSM alert should be generated.
UpdateRoot.actionComment: Track is located in RVSM_ZONE_ALPHA with FL range FL290-FL410. RVSM monitoring system is set to OPERATIONAL.
UpdateRoot.actionDescription: Track is IFR with RVSM approval status NOT_APPROVED, but flight level is initially below RVSM range. All conditions for RVSM Non-Approval alert generation are fulfilled except flight level range. As a result, no RVSM alert should be generated.

TestResult.resultDescription: No RVSM alert is generated because flight level (FL280) is below RVSM range (FL290-FL410).
TestResult.nextActionComment: Track climbs into RVSM airspace at time 10. Flight level becomes FL350 which is within FL290-FL410 range.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: Track flight level enters RVSM range. This should trigger a RVSM Non-Approval alert.

TestResult.resultDescription: RVSM alert is generated because flight level (FL350) is within RVSM range (FL290-FL410) and aircraft is NOT_APPROVED.
TestResult.nextActionComment: Track climbs above RVSM airspace at time 15. Flight level becomes FL420 which is above FL410.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: Track flight level exits RVSM range. RVSM alert should be cleared.

TestResult.resultDescription: No RVSM alert is generated because flight level (FL420) is above RVSM range (FL290-FL410).
